e="preserve">Boris Leskin (January 5, 1923 – February 21, 2020) was a Romanian-born Russian-American actor. He was born in Chişinău, Bessarabia, Romania He was known for his roles in "Heavenly Swallows", "Vampire's Kiss" and "Men in Black". His last known role was in "Everything Is Illuminated.
Leskin died in New York City on February 21, 2020 at the age of 97.
